ygData.subject: Re: Why did you choose to play a paladin?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, mostly you all sum it up I made a paladin for all the same reasons: To be the holy knight on the field protecting the weak and defending all. Removing
ygData.messageBody:
Well, mostly you all sum it up I made a paladin for all the same reasons:
To be the holy knight on the field protecting the weak and defending all.
Removing the undead curse from the land while remaining pure. Helping all in
need even if means forsaking yourself.

That is why I play the paladin even if it means a long hard road ahead, (exp
wise) We are the class that looks out for all even if it means losing some
exp or loot. We chose this course full well knowing the requirements for it.
Paladins may be a hard class to play but I for one am glad to stick with it
(believe me I have tried all other classes). In the long run our fortitude
will pay off,

Shakel Almeth
Tarrew Marr
